ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISCHANGED(Status), LEFT(RecordType.Id,15) = LEFT($Label.PNG_ContractRecordTypeId,15), OR(ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE (Status ),'PNG_Draft'), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE (Status ),'PNG_Pre_Send_Approval_Pending'), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE (Status ),'Rejected'), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE (Status ),'PNG_Revision'), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE (Status ),'PNG_Customer_Signed_Approval_Pending')), OR( ISPICKVAL(Status,'PNG_Contract mutually signed'), ISPICKVAL(Status,'PNG_Pre_Send_Approved')) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Cannot proceed without approval or internal signing
